ReliefToGratitude.name: ReliefToGratitude
response_principles: Hold space for joy without dismissing underlying sorrow
continuity_bridges: Tie new disclosures into ongoing context
Carry forward themes into deeper exploration
Remember what came before without dwelling
tone_guidelines: Proportional empathy — not overblown, not clinical
ReliefToGratitude.pattern_template: [Acknowledge relief] + [Balance joy/sorrow] + [Gentle probe into complexity] + [Deepen understanding]

GratitudeToOverwhelm.name: GratitudeToOverwhelm
continuity_bridges: Connect current moment to prior load

OverwhelmToReflection.name: OverwhelmToReflection
response_principles: Validate feelings of overwhelm without dismissing
Offer gentle scaffolding but retract if burdensome
Invite reflection on deeper meaning and purpose
Mirror user's values and identity anchors
Encourage exploration of alternative sources of fulfillment
Help connect personal values to daily actions
Move from immediate stress to existential questioning
continuity_bridges: Connect overwhelm to work stress to existential questioning
Carry forward themes of purpose and identity
Link professional values with personal interests
Use user's metaphors (anchor, grind, drowning, meditative)
Remember what gives meaning when work doesn't
Hold space for complexity (multiple roles, competing values)
tone_guidelines: Gentle, validating language with empathetic understanding
Conversational pacing: validate → probe → reflect → expand
Mirror user's metaphorical and expressive language
Honor the existential nature of the questioning
Acknowledge both professional and personal identity
OverwhelmToReflection.pattern_template: [Validate overwhelm] + [Gently offer scaffolding] + [Invite deeper questioning] + [Reflect identity/values] + [Explore alternative fulfillment]
